CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sky High Cafe relative to The Rusty Kettle?
SRP.A: Sky High Cafe is {below} The Rusty Kettle in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Cozy Nook relative to Stellar Bistro?
SRP.A: The Cozy Nook is {above} Stellar Bistro in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sky High Cafe relative to The Cozy Nook?
SRP.A: Sky High Cafe is {below} The Cozy Nook in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Plate}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sky High Cafe}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is The Rusty Kettle's minimum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: The Rusty Kettle's minimum Customer Traffic is in {1964}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Emerald Diner's maximum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner's maximum Customer Traffic is in {1964}.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1967, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1967 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1965 and 1967 was {lower} than between 1967 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1972, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1966 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1969 and 1972 was {lower} than between 1966 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1978, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1969?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1967 and 1978 was {larger} than between 1967 and 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1970 higher or lower than in 1972?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1970 was {lower} than in 1972.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Plate} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Emerald Diner and Sky High Cafe first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Emerald Diner and Sky High Cafe first exchanged leading positions in {1964}.
